title: 服务器崩溃求解决
author: 紫军
txt_content: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM warning: ignoring option MaxPermSize=128M; support was removed in 8.002.05 08:43:26 [Server] INFO The state engine was in incorrect state POSTINITIALIZATION and forced into state SERVER_STOPPED. Errors may have been discarded.02.05 08:43:26 [Server] INFO Holder lookups applied02.05 08:43:26 [Server] INFO Applying holder lookups02.05 08:43:26 [Server] WARN Can't revert to frozen GameData state without freezing first.02.05 08:43:26 [Server] WARN Perhaps a server is already running on that port?02.05 08:43:26 [Server] WARN The exception was: java.net.BindException: Address already in use: bind02.05 08:43:26 [Server] WARN **** FAILED TO BIND TO PORT!02.05 08:43:26 [Server] INFO Starting Minecraft server on 0.0.0.0:2556502.05 08:43:25 [Server] INFO Generating keypair02.05 08:43:25 [Server] INFO Using 4 threads for Netty based IO02.05 08:43:25 [Server] WARN =============================================================02.05 08:43:25 [Server] WARN Use FMLCommonHandler.exitJava instead02.05 08:43:25 [Server] WARN Offendor: org/spigotmc/RestartCommand.restart()V02.05 08:43:25 [Server] WARN MOD HAS DIRECT REFERENCE System.exit() THIS IS NOT ALLOWED REROUTING TO FML!

replies.author: Jonjs_Dada
replies.txt_content: 有可能是没有绑定端口或者端口被占用
